name: Aarav Hayes
summary: Motivated Junior DevOps Engineer with 1.5 years of experience in cloud infrastructure and automation. Recently completed DevOps bootcamp and eager to apply CI/CD best practices in production environments. Strong foundation in Linux administration, containerization, and infrastructure as code.

experience.title: Junior DevOps Engineer
highlights: Maintain and monitor AWS infrastructure for 3 client applications

experience.title: IT Support Technician

name: Abby Macias
summary: QA Automation Engineer with 2 years of experience in test automation seeking to transition to DevOps. Strong programming skills in Python and experience with CI/CD pipelines from the testing perspective. Familiar with Docker and AWS from QA automation work. Eager to expand infrastructure and deployment automation skills.

name: Abel Hoover
summary: Site Reliability Engineer with 4 years of experience building and maintaining highly available systems. Specialized in observability, incident response, and automation. Strong background in Kubernetes orchestration, monitoring stack design, and performance optimization. Passionate about improving system reliability through SRE best practices and SLO-driven development.

experience.title: Site Reliability Engineer
highlights: Manage production Kubernetes clusters serving 50M+ requests daily
Reduced incident MTTR by 60% through improved monitoring and automated remediation
Designed and implemented observability stack using Prometheus, Grafana, and Loki
Created SLO framework and error budget policies for 15+ services
Led post-mortem process and drove reliability improvements

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
highlights: Deployed and maintained AWS infrastructure using Terraform
Migrated applications from EC2 to containerized Kubernetes environment
Implemented centralized logging with ELK stack
Automated deployment processes reducing release time by 70%

name: Abel McKinney

highlights: Design and implement Azure infrastructure for enterprise clients

experience.title: Systems Administrator
